text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Amara satru o tomadera satruke bandhurupe grahana karo na, tomara ki tadera prati bandhutbera prastaba karabe, athaca satyera ya-kichu tomadera kache eseche tate tara abisbasa kareche, tara rasulake o tomadera bahiskara kare diyeche yehetu tomara tomadera prabhu allahâ€Œte bisbasa kara. Yadi tomara beriye thaka amara pathe sangrama karate o amara prasannata labhera pratyasaya, tabe ki tomara tadera prati gopanabhabe'o bandhutba dekhabe, athaca ami bhala jani ya tomara gopana rekhecha ebam ya tomara prakasa karacha? Ara tomadera madhye ye ke'u eti kare se to tabe sarala patha theke bicyuta hayeche.
